footer.copyright_leading: Content is generated by AI and is for reference only

example.text1: Life is like an ocean, only those with strong will can reach the other shore
example.text2: Failure is the mother of success, every failure is a stepping stone to success
example.text3: Opportunities are always left for those who are prepared, only by continuous learning and accumulation can you seize them
example.text4: Time flies, time waits for no one, cherish the present, live in the moment
example.text5: There is no absolute fairness in the world, but we can strive to create our own opportunities
example.text6: On the road of growth, be brave to be yourself, don't be swayed by others' opinions
example.text7: Every dream that seems impossible begins with a firm belief
example.text8: Success is not the end, failure is not the end, only persevering courage is the ultimate victory
example.text9: Life is a journey, what matters is not the destination, but the scenery along the way and the mood in which you view it
example.text10: Every dark cloud has a silver lining, hope can always be found in difficult situations
example.text11: Changing yourself is a difficult decision, but it is a process full of power
example.text12: The size of dreams doesn't matter, what matters is the courage to chase them
example.text13: Life is not always fair, but we can choose to face each day with a positive attitude
example.text14: Only by bravely stepping out of your comfort zone can you discover new worlds and more possibilities
example.text15: Humility is not about underestimating yourself, but about maintaining self-reflection while giving praise to others

voiceClone.referenceText: The water cycle is a natural circulation system. Water evaporates from the ground, forms clouds, and then returns to the ground as rain. This circulation process is vital for life on Earth
